item.description:
I thought this may interest some Collective members.  It should be an interesting show.  

 

And afterwards, we can put the theory of cocktail culture into practice by going to have a drink somewhere after the show!

 

This is taken from RISD's website on the show:

Cocktail Culture : Ritual and Invention in American Fashion, 1920-1980    is the first multi-disciplinary exhibition to explore the social ritual of the cocktail hour through the lens of fashion and design.

Organized by the RISD Museum of Art’s Department of Costume and Textiles,  Cocktail Culture  features stunning fashion apparel from Balenciaga to Schiaparelli, jewelry, textiles, decorative and fine art, film, photographs, and more. 

 

It'll be a great time!
item.how_to_find_us: Jeff Gale is hosting this one - please look at his picture and he'll be posting the details!
item.name: Cocktail Culture!
